title: Full Name
description_md:
**Task**
Write a program that takes as input a person's firstname and their last name. Your program should then output their full name by combining the two inputs with a space separating them AND formatting the names so they start with an uppercase letter but are otherwise all lowercase.

**Constraints**
The provided input words will only consist of uppercase and lowercase letters but not necessarily correctly formatted.
Input format:
Two strings of letters.

Output format:
A string consisting of letters and a space, correctly formatted for names.
starter_code: # Write a program that takes as input a person's firstname and their last name. Your program should then output their full name by combining the two inputs with a space separating them AND formatting the names so they start with an uppercase letter but are otherwise all lowercase.

title: Pruning Flowers
description_md:
**Task**
Write a program that takes, as input, a string of flower names and outputs a new string with any duplicate flowers removed.

**Constraints**
The flowers will all have one word names and each flower name will be separated by a single space. The output string must contain the flowers in the same order as the input, except that any duplicates have been removed.

Input format:
A string.

Output format:
A string.
starter_code: # Write a program that takes, as input, a string of flower names and outputs a new string with any duplicate flowers removed.

title: Same Close Different
description_md:
**Task**
Write a program that takes as input two integers and outputs whether they are the same, close or different.

Information:
The two integers are the "same" if they equal to each other.
The two integers are "close" if they are within 1 of each other. (e.g. 3 and 4, or 4 and 3)
The two integers are "different" if the difference between them is greater than 1.

**Constraints**
Input format:
Two integers on separate lines. The integers provided will be from 0 to 1000.

Output format:
One of three strings, "same", "close", or "different".
starter_code:
# Write a program that takes as input two integers and outputs whether they are the same, close or different.
